dest[source]

dest(destination_dataset_table, prefix_dataset='tmp', return_dataset_only=False, return_table_only=False)

If AIRFLOW_ENV != PROD then write results to prefix_dataset instead.

:param destination_dataset_table: destination to write results to. :return: destination_dataset_table: destination to write results to with prefix added if needed.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

dest_dict[source]

dest_dict(destination_dataset_table, prefix_dataset='tmp')

Wrapper for dest() but to return as dict.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

sched[source]

sched(schedule:Any)

If AIRFLOW_ENV != PROD then schedule should be @once.

:param schedule: schedule for prod. :return: schedule: schedule if prod else @once.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}
